column5:
I’m having the same reaction as you right now about a job offer. Constant anxiety about all the little things that could go wrong.
I just wish I could relax and be happy.
Thank you! I just realized how tense I was. I needed this.
I really hate my job. Today was one of those days when I just wanted to scream ’I quit!’.  Hopefully I’ll be able to change career in a couple of months when I’m done with my studies.
